#summary about the Live Demo Server
#labels Phase-Support

= Hardware =

  * 2.4 GHz Celeron 
  * 1 GB RAM

= Software =

  * Debian 3.1
  * Apache 2
  * Java JDK 1.5
  * xvfb (virtual frame buffer)
  * xlibs
  * openoffice 2 in headless Modus
  * imagemagick
  * Tomcat (included in OpenLaszlo)
  * Jetty (include in Red5)

= Network =

  * partly connected through my local company Gateway and University of Applied Science Pforzheim
